name: Twilight Sparkle Mania
description:
WOW! This is my new Mania game. It's called Twilgiht Sparkle Mania. It's made with Darkyoshi Mario Engine 4. See more features in this game.

There's Mario Mania Forums, Sonic Mania Forums and MKFusion Forums here.

You can download Twilight Sparkle Mania and Play Twilight Sparkle Mania.
